title: SimpleCard Configuration Example
description: Comprehensive configuration example for the nosto-simple-card web component, including all exposed attributes, variant selector integration for sibling product aggregation, swatch rendering configuration (metafields/metaobjects), and style overrides for all sections.

handle.description: The Shopify product handle to fetch data for

variantId.description: The specific variant ID to display. When set, shows this variant's data instead of the default variant

imageMode.description: Image display mode. 'alternate' for hover image swap, 'carousel' for image carousel with navigation

discount.description: Show discount data (compare-at-price and discount percentage)

rating.description: Product rating value (0-5). Displays star rating if set

imageSizes.description: The sizes attribute for responsive images to help the browser choose the right image size

mock.description: If true, uses mock data instead of fetching from Shopify

variantSelector.description: Configuration for nested variant selector to enable sibling product aggregation and variant selection

handle.description: The Shopify product handle (should match SimpleCard handle)

variantId.description: The ID of the variant to preselect on load

preselect.description: Whether to automatically preselect the options of the first available variant

placeholder.description: If true, displays placeholder content while loading

maxValues.description: Maximum number of option values to display per option. When exceeded, shows an ellipsis indicator

mode.description: Display mode: 'options' for pill buttons or 'compact' for dropdown select

integration.description: How VariantSelector integrates with SimpleCard for sibling product aggregation
workflow: 1. User selects a variant option in the VariantSelector
2. VariantSelector emits a custom event with variant details (productId, variantId, handle)
3. SimpleCard listens for the event and updates its variantId and handle properties
4. SimpleCard re-renders with the new variant's data
5. This enables showing different sibling products (e.g., different colors with same style)

swatchRendering.description: Configuration for swatch rendering using Shopify metafields and metaobjects
swatchRendering.note: Swatch rendering is currently planned for future implementation (see TODO in VariantSelector/options/markup.ts line 51)

colorSwatches.description: Display color swatches for color options using metafield data

dataTypes.description: Hex color value stored in metafield
Reference to uploaded swatch image in Shopify Files

patternSwatches.description: Display pattern/texture swatches using metaobject references

materialSwatches.description: Display material swatches with images and labels

implementationApproach.description: Recommended implementation strategy for swatch rendering
steps: 1. Extend GraphQL query to fetch option metafields (getProductByHandle.graphql)
2. Add swatch property to ShopifyOptionValue type
3. Update generateOptionValueHTML() to render swatches based on metafield data
4. Add CSS custom properties for swatch styling
5. Support both inline color values and image references

styleOverrides.description: CSS custom properties for styling all sections of SimpleCard and nested VariantSelector

simpleCard.description: Style overrides for the SimpleCard component

--font-size.description: Base font size for card content

cssParts.description: CSS part selectors for deeper styling of shadow DOM elements

variantSelector.description: Style overrides for the VariantSelector component (both 'options' and 'compact' modes)

optionsMode.description: CSS custom properties for 'options' mode (pill buttons)

--row-gap.description: Gap between option label and values

--row-margin.description: Bottom margin for each option row

--ellipsis-color.description: Color for ellipsis indicator (when maxValues exceeded)

cssParts.description: CSS part selectors for options mode

compactMode.description: CSS custom properties for 'compact' mode (dropdown select)

usage.description: Complete HTML usage examples with all features

examples.name: Basic SimpleCard with all attributes
examples.html:
<nosto-simple-card
  handle="awesome-product"
  variant-id="12345678901234"
  image-mode="carousel"
  brand
  discount
  rating="4.5"
  image-sizes="(max-width: 768px) 100vw, (max-width: 1200px) 50vw, 33vw"
></nosto-simple-card>

examples.name: SimpleCard with VariantSelector for sibling product aggregation
examples.html:
<nosto-simple-card
  handle="awesome-product"
  image-mode="alternate"
  brand
  discount
  rating="4.5"
>
  <nosto-variant-selector
    handle="awesome-product"
    preselect
    max-values="8"
    mode="options"
  ></nosto-variant-selector>
  <button n-atc>Add to cart</button>
</nosto-simple-card>

examples.name: SimpleCard with compact VariantSelector
examples.html:
<nosto-simple-card
  handle="awesome-product"
  brand
  discount
>
  <nosto-variant-selector
    handle="awesome-product"
    mode="compact"
  ></nosto-variant-selector>
  <button n-atc>Add to cart</button>
</nosto-simple-card>

examples.name: Styled SimpleCard with CSS custom properties
examples.html:
<style>
  nosto-simple-card {
    --font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
    --font-size: 1rem;
    --content-padding: 1rem;
    --brand-color: #333;
    --discount-bg: #ff0000;
    --discount-color: #fff;
    --rating-color: #ffa500;
    --carousel-indicator-bg-active: #007bff;
  }

  nosto-simple-card::part(card) {
    border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  }

  nosto-variant-selector {
    --value-active-bg: #ff0000;
    --value-active-border: #ff0000;
    --value-padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  }
</style>

<nosto-simple-card
  handle="awesome-product"
  image-mode="carousel"
  brand
  discount
  rating="4.5"
>
  <nosto-variant-selector
    handle="awesome-product"
    preselect
  ></nosto-variant-selector>
</nosto-simple-card>

globalDefaults.description: Set default values for all SimpleCard instances using the setSimpleCardDefaults function
globalDefaults.example:
import { setSimpleCardDefaults } from '@nosto/web-components'

setSimpleCardDefaults({
  brand: true,
  discount: true,
  imageMode: 'alternate',
  imageSizes: '(max-width: 768px) 100vw, (max-width: 1200px) 50vw, 33vw'
})
